channel.title: The tools we use - an expert roundup
channel.description:
Hi y'all.
Inspired by @Shpigford's post on the tools he uses for Baremetrics, I have started an expert roundup with the same topic: [Expert roundup on tools to use when bootstrapping your startup][1]
The twist here is: You can join the effort, make the roundup even better AND get a free link in exchange (which will help your SEO, improve your rankings and get you more traffic to your website). The article contains details on how to contribute.
[So don't wait too long and tell us which tools you use to build your startup][2]!
[1]: http://blog.linksspy.com/tools-founders-use-for-world-domination/ [2]: http://blog.linksspy.com/tools-founders-use-for-world-domination/

item.title: The tools we use - an expert roundup
item.dc:creator: itengelhardt
item.description:
Wow thanks for the catch.
I’ve updated it to 28th February.
Sorry for the confusion!

Read full topic
item.source: The tools we use - an expert roundup
